      • country

        public com.neovisionaries.i18n.CountryCode country()
        Gets the country associated with the user.
        Returns:
        the country stored in session, or the default country of the shop if none stored.

      • availableCountries

        public java.util.List<com.neovisionaries.i18n.CountryCode> availableCountries()
        Gets the list of available countries for this shop, as defined in the configuration file.
        Returns:
        the list of available countries.

      • defaultCountry

        public com.neovisionaries.i18n.CountryCode defaultCountry()
        Gets the default country for this shop, as defined in the configuration file.
        Returns:
        the first valid country defined in the configuration file.
        Throws:
        DefaultCountryNotFound - when a default valid country could not be found.

      • changeCountry

        public void changeCountry(java.lang.String countryCodeAsString)
        Sets the country associated with the user, if a valid country code is provided.
        Parameters:
        countryCodeAsString - the string representing a country code.
        Throws:
        InvalidCountryCode - when the country code does not correspond to a valid country.

      • parseCode

        public static java.util.Optional<com.neovisionaries.i18n.CountryCode> parseCode(java.lang.String countryCodeAsString)
        Parses a country code as string.
        Parameters:
        countryCodeAsString - the string representing a country code.
        Returns:
        the country code represented in the string, or absent if it does not correspond to a valid country.
